item.title: Consensus, Part 2
item.description: Hashing It Out is continuing its series on blockchain infrastructure with the Consensus layer. In this episode, Corey, Dee and Jessie talk to Ethereum Co-Founder, Vitalik Buterin.

item.title: Data, Part 1
item.description: Hashing It Out is continuing its series on blockchain infrastructure with the Data layer. In this episode, Corey and Jessie talk to Dmitriy Ryajov and Eric Castro from Status.

item.title: Data, Part 2
item.description: Hashing It Out continues its series on blockchain infrastructure with part 2 of the data layer. In this episode Corey and Jessie talk to Jacek Sieka from Status.

item.title: Flash Hash: Oct 31, 2022
item.description: This episode includes bitcoin mining trouble, THE protocol, and a trip into the metaverse.

item.title: Personals - Lucian Stroie
item.description: In this Hashing It Out Personals episode, we talk to Lucian Stroie, Senior Technical Product Manager at Ava Labs and Founder at Coral.

item.title: Network Infrastructure, Part 1
item.description: In this episode, Corey, Dee and Jessie talk to Assistant Professor of electrical and computer engineering at Carnegie Mellon University, Giulia Fanti & member of the Vac research development group at Status, Hanno Cornelius.

item.title: Flash Hash: Oct 09, 2022
item.description: This episode includes Nasdaq trading crytpo, proof-of-work going extinct, and VCs highjacking growth in new networks.
